gossip info: Liam OConnor shared concerns regarding Akiko Sato’s integrity in business transactions, specifically mentioning that Sergey Petrov believes she may not have been completely transparent in her latest investment moves. This lack of transparency has raised red flags about her credibility, and Liam feels it’s prudent to exercise caution when dealing with her until clearer evidence is available.

Sergey Petrov mentioned that Fatima Ali's dealings may not be as trustworthy as they seem.
